document_data.name: Bracetar
document_data.mainbody: '''Bracetar''' was an author and scholar writing in or before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the 1370s DR, Bracetar's work ''[[Notes On Preservation of Foodstuffs and Oils]]'' was amongst the works in [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: In the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, [[Noumea Cardellith]], pretending to be a merchant from [[Lantan]], claimed to be interested in Bracetar's ''Notes On Preservation of Foodstuffs and Oils'' when seeking admittance to Candlekeep.
